key.name: kb-type
key.description: Select Zhuyin keyboard layout

key.name: sel-keys
key.description: Keys used to select candidate. For example "asdfghjkl;", press 'a' to select the 1st candidate, 's' for 2nd, and so on.

key.name: show-systray
key.description: On: Show Chinese/English and Full/Half shape status as a systray icon Off: Do not show the status icon

key.name: auto-shift-cur
key.description: Automatically move the cursor to the next character after selection

key.name: add-phrase-direction
key.description: Use Ctrl + Numbers (2-9) to add new phrase before the cursor

key.name: clean-buffer-focus-out
key.summary: Clean pre-edit buffer when focus out
key.description: On: Clean pre-edit buffer when focus out to prevent program crash Off: Keep what you already type for convenience

key.name: easy-symbol-input
key.description: Press shift to input Chinese punctuation symbols

key.name: esc-clean-all-buf
key.description: Escape key cleans the text in pre-edit-buffer

key.name: enable-fullwidth-toggle-key
key.description: Enable fullwidth/halfwidth toggle key (Shift+Space)

key.name: max-chi-symbol-len
key.description: Maximum Chinese characters in pre-edit buffer, not including inputing Zhuyin symbols.

key.name: default-use-english-mode
key.summary: Switch to alphanumeric mode after startup
key.description: Automatically switch to alphanumeric mode after startup. This mode is sutible when using Chewing as the only IM.

key.name: chi-eng-mode-toggle
key.description: Toggle Chinese/Alphanumeric mode with key

key.name: default-english-case
key.summary: Default English letter case (Only effective when Caps Lock is the toggle key)
key.description: no control: No default letter case. Not recommend if you use multiple keyboards or synergy lowercase: Default to lowercase, press shift for uppercase. uppercase: Default to uppercase, press shift for lowercase.

key.name: sync-caps-lock
key.description: Occasionally, the CapsLock status does not match the IM, this option determines how these status be synchronized. Valid values: "disable": Do nothing "keyboard": IM status follows keyboard status "IM": Keyboard status follows IM status

key.name: notify-mode-change
key.summary: Notify when Chinese/English or Fullwidth/Halfwidth mode changes
key.description: Display a simple notification when an input mode change is triggered by user input.

key.name: plain-zhuyin
key.description: In plain Zhuyin mode, automatic candidate selection and related options are disabled or ignored. Deprecated option - use conversion-engine instead.

key.name: conversion-engine
key.description: In Simple mode, automatic candidate selection and related options are disabled or ignored. In FuzzyChewing mode, tones or even parts of bopomofo can be omitted.

key.name: cand-per-page
key.description: Number of candidate per page.

key.name: show-page-number
key.description: Display the page number of the candidate list.

key.name: phrase-choice-from-last
key.description: Open candidate list from the back of a phrase, without moving the cursor to the front.

key.name: space-as-selection
key.description: Press Space to select the candidate.

key.name: vertical-lookup-table
key.description: Use vertical lookup table.
